function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global pandemic impact on social housing","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread in social housing","Mitigation":"Enhanced sanitation, vaccination, and rapid response protocols","Technologies":"Smart sanitization systems, remote health monitoring, and contact tracing apps","People":"Residents of social housing, especially those in high-density areas","Owner":"Local housing authorities and public health agencies"},{"Description":"Decline in public investment in decommodified housing","Impact":"Reduced availability of affordable and safe housing","Mitigation":"Increased public investment, policy incentives for affordable housing development","Technologies":"Affordable housing construction technologies, digital housing management systems","People":"Low-income individuals and families in need of affordable housing","Owner":"Government housing authorities, private developers, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Privatization of social housing units","Impact":"Deterioration of housing conditions, inequality in access to housing","Mitigation":"Regulation of private housing providers, investment in public housing, and tenant protections","Technologies":"Data analytics for housing monitoring, digital platforms for tenant rights protection","People":"Tenants in privatized social housing units, especially low-income individuals","Owner":"Government housing authorities, housing regulatory bodies, and community organizations"}]}
